user_message: Why was I charged twice?
expected_response: I'll help you investigate the double charge. Let me check your account to see what happened.

user_message: I need a refund for my last purchase
expected_response: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days. Please provide your order number and reason for the refund.

user_message: How much does the premium plan cost?
expected_response: The premium plan costs $29.99/month. You can view all pricing options in Settings > Billing.

user_message: Can you send me an invoice?
expected_response: You can download invoices from Settings > Billing > Invoices. All past invoices are available there.

user_message: I forgot my password
expected_response: You can reset your password by clicking "Forgot Password" on the login page. We'll send you a reset link.

user_message: How do I change my email address?
expected_response: You can update your email address in Settings > Account > Email. You'll need to verify the new email address.

user_message: I can't access my account
expected_response: Let me help you regain access. Please verify your email address and we'll send you account recovery instructions.

user_message: How long does shipping take?
expected_response: Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days. Express shipping is available for 1-2 business days.

user_message: Can I change my subscription plan?

user_message: I want to upgrade my plan

user_message: What's your return policy?
expected_response: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. Items must be in original condition. Contact us to initiate a return.

user_message: How do I initiate a return?
expected_response: You can initiate a return by going to Orders > Select Item > Return. We'll provide you with a return label and instructions.

user_message: What are your business hours?
expected_response: Our customer support is available Monday-Friday 9am-5pm EST. You can also reach us 24/7 via email.
